    Function reference

    NHANES data

    NHANES data include in-home interviews and study examinations conducted at mobile examination centers.

    nhanes_data
    NHANES data, 1999-2020
    nhanes_key
    NHANES Variables: Names, Roles, and Descriptions
    key_guide
    Guide to making keys

    NHANES web application

    Analyze NHANES data interactively

    app_run()
    Run the NHANES application

    NHANES summary functions

    Simple and direct functions to summarize or visualize an outcome using NHANES data.

    nhanes_summarize()
    Generate summaries of NHANES
    nhanes_visualize()
    Visualize summaries of NHANES

    NHANES design functions

    Back-end functions for NHANES summary functions.

    nhanes_design()
    Survey Design for NHANES Data
    nhanes_design_standardize()
    Standardize an NHANES design
    nhanes_design_subset()
    Subset an NHANES design object
    nhanes_design_summarize()
    Summarize an NHANES design
    nhanes_design_update()
    Modify an NHANES design
    nhanes_design_viz()
    Visualize a summary of NHANES data
    nhanes_calibrate()
    Calibration of NHANES weights
    print(<nhanes_design>)
    Print an NHANES design
    get_var_info() get_variable_class() get_variable_label() get_variable_source() get_variable_description() get_variable_type() get_variable_module()
